financebench_id_00499: Yes, 3M is a capital-intensive business based on FY2022 data. This is indicated by the significant investment in property, plant, and equipment (PP&E) of $1,749 million.
financebench_id_01226: Operating margin change as of FY2022 for 3M was driven by increased SG&A costs due to special item costs for litigation, impairment costs related to exiting PFAS manufacturing, costs related to exiting Russia, divestiture-related restructuring charges, and investment in growth initiatives, partially offset by restructuring benefits and cost management.
